name: Hibiscus Red | Part 1
description:
Hibiscus Red | Part 1: Voices from beyond

In the first part of this new adventure game series Hibiscus discovers the shocking truth about his father and sets on a journey to save his family and the world. Or is it worlds?

Features:
- Almost classic point and click adventure game
- Part 1 of 4 with around one hour of gameplay
- Multi-language support: English and german texts
- Text-to-speech option for english language (I know this sounds really bad at times, you can switch it off in the options if it bothers you :D)
